unnormalised: Baraabar, konnen tori vicharlem, "Robot amchi sogli kaamam haddtelim kai?" Hahaha, hem ek voddlem prashn!
normalised: Bore, konnem tori vicharlem, "Robotam amcheo soglleo nokreo gheteleo?" Hasonk yeta, tem ek vhodd prosn!

unnormalised: Gambhirponnan vichar kelear, shaant ravat! Robot ekdom tumchi chai stall cholovchea vo tumchi auto-rickshaw thik korchea naa. Zaite punn 2050-ant? Punn tedna legit, samosache kimate vixim robotakodden konn bhando kortolo? AI husyaar zata, kharim. Mhojea cousinal ekdom fency Roomba asa, model RX-7000, tem Gurgaonant tacho flat saf korta. Punn tema aazun legit darantlea chapplanc bhadta.
normalised: Gambhirponnan punn, shaant rav! Robot achanok tumcho chai stall choloitole vo tumcho auto-rickshaw sarkho koritole nant. Don hozar ponnasant zait? Punn ten'nai punn, konn robotak samosachea kim'mativixim vad ghaltet? A-I hushar zata, khoree. Mhojea bhavak ek fancy Roomba asa, model R-X-satt hozar, zo Gurgaonant tachem flat saf korta. Punn to tea darantlea chapplancher attkun poddta.

unnormalised: Vichar karat. Amkam lok zai hea botank bandhchea ani program korchea khatir. TCS ani Infosys sarkhea company chodd bharti kortat! Plus, konn robotak Chandni Chowkant bore kimate khatir zhogdcho shikoutolo? Vo Bollywood plotlinechea barekansank somzon gheta? Robotak "Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi" ullovchea cheshta karat! Tem kadachit short-circuit zatelem!
normalised: Vichar korat. Amkam heo bots bandhunk ani program korunk lok zai asat. T-C-S ani Infosys sarkhea companyo khub bhorti kortat! Plus, Chandni Chowkant boreant borea kim'matak sodpak robotak konn xikoitolo? Vo Bollywood plotlinechea barekant samzunk? Robotak "Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi" sangunk prayatn korat! To kadchit short-circuit zatolo!

unnormalised: Taka lagun, robotiki bhavis assa. Punn bhavisak desi common sense ani bhav-tav korpachi bhangarachi bhuk legit zai. Tumchi retirement plans aazun legit poilim dhaddnaka. Tum voddponnan circuits ani codeacho zomo asthi, unneachya unnea fattle 25 vorsam khatir tori. Shaanti!
normalised: Tor, hankaar, robotics bhavixy asa. Punn bhavixyakui desi sadharan bud'di ani molbhav korpachi kuxaltai zai. Atancheach tumcheo nivrutti yozna don pautti adim korunk naka. Tumhi circuit ani codeachea zundapekt chodd moladik asat, kam'm-ich vis panch vorshank tori. Shaanti gheun ravat!
